text:
- [Voice Over] Are you considering
migrating to the cloud?

Kickstart your journey
with migration evaluator

to get a data-driven business
case and migration plan.

Migration evaluator is a
complimentary AWS service

that provides insights to
accelerate decision-making
for migration to the cloud.

As part of this service,
an AWS Solutions Architect

helps you install a
single agentless collector

to gather data from your
on premises network.

The Solutions Architect
will then use this data

to build a directional
business case containing
customized future state AWS cost models.

Next, use this collected
data to get a bird's eye view

of your environment
using AWS Migration Hub
server dependency mapping feature.
Use these network graphs
to see how your servers communicate,
group them into applications,
and identify which applications
are early candidates for migration.

You can also perform a
deeper inspection of a server

to identify the role of the
server, create move groups,
assign priorities and other metadata
to help create your migration plan.
With a business case supplemented
with the server dependency map,

you can begin planning
your migration to AWS
and unlock significant cost savings.
Request migration evaluator today.
